issue.title: Re-enable homebrew formula
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4478](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4478). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since apache-arrow [formula on homebrew has been removed](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/pull/36063), brew recommendation in R installation error message should be removed. <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/r/configure#L90>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4478?focusedCommentId=16760452) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
I think that we should send a pull request to Homebrew to re-add Apache Arrow support instead of removing the message. Homebrew support will be useful widely.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4478?focusedCommentId=16760453) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Yes. We need Homebrew support for Arrow to be able to have Arrow in CRAN

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4478?focusedCommentId=16760466) by Aki Ariga (chezou):*
Agreed. I'll change the JIRA ticket title.

btw, AFAIK, main reasons that Arrow formula had been removed are 1) the formula was broken and outdated and 2) it has build options. Mike also says build options in formulas on homebrew-core should be removed or we, Apache Arrow community, should manage the options for formula in a tap.
https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/issues/31510

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4478?focusedCommentId=16760500) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Now, this duplicates ARROW-4300.
